channel.title: Making people think WTF!? Ive been hacked?
channel.description:
This is a little trick i just thought of.
Ok, first off make a thread on any forums. When there are lots of replies, rename the thread and edit the text inside. So you could make a thread called ' hello ' and someone could reply saying ' hello ' then you rename it to like anything and edit it to anything. Then they could easily think they have been hacked, and the person who hacked them said hello =/
Should work, havnt tried it myself yet. Only just thought of it, really hungry right now, going to get some breakfast :)

item.title: Making people think WTF!? Ive been hacked?
item.dc:creator: @Cruzer Cruzer
item.description:
@Cruzer wrote:

[quote=“lordbost, post:8, topic:210736”][quote author=Gotta Catch Them All link=topic=277614.msg2262810#msg2262810 date=1212850582]
Only someone dumb enough to fish their toast out of the toaster with a fork would fall for this
[/quote]
I do that [/quote]
Ha so do I.

Read full topic

item.title: Making people think WTF!? Ive been hacked?
item.dc:creator: @bloodrayne bloodrayne
item.description:
@bloodrayne wrote:

That’s kind of funny I guess… But people can always check times and stuff :s

Another thing I just thought of:

Thread title: Hello!

Threat body: How you doing?!

Response #1: I’m doing good.

–

After that response, you edit the thread into something totally different, such as a chat about the economy or something. The first responder will look like a complete idiot, and you can laugh!

Read full topic
